Package psi

Contains the factories to initialize and/or load the PSI client and the PSI server objects, as well as the factory methods to generate key descriptions, which are objects that can be used to provide external keys to the PSI objects.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PsiClientFactory
    Offers a generic interface to load a specific PsiClient implementation and configuration based on the provided inputs (client session, key description and cache provider).
    PsiClientKeyDescription
    Contains the variables used by the client to perform encryption operations.
    PsiClientKeyDescriptionFactory
    Generates a PsiClientKeyDescription depending on the selected PsiClient implementation, requesting only the variables to be initialized.
    PsiServerFactory
    Offers a generic interface to initialize or load a specific PsiServer implementation and configuration depending on the provided inputs (algorithm parameters, key description and cache provider).
    PsiServerKeyDescription
    Contains the variables used by the server to perform encryption operations.
    PsiServerKeyDescriptionFactory
    Generates a PsiServerKeyDescription depending on the selected PsiServer implementation, requesting only the variables to be initialized.

Package psi Description

Contains the factories to initialize and/or load the PSI client and the PSI server objects, as well as the factory methods to generate key descriptions, which are objects that can be used to provide external keys to the PSI objects.
